column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=A year ago I had to go visit my relatives who lives in England .
#id=2
#text=Of course this meant the only viable method of travel would be to fly on an airplane .
#id=3
#text=I 've never flown on an airplane before so I was n't sure what the process involved .
#id=4
#text=I decided to go online and do some research about what I would need to do .
#id=5
#text=I found out it was actually a lot easier than I anticipated .
#id=6
#text=I was able to buy my ticket online , and when the day of the flight came I had my friend drop me off at the airport .
#id=7
#text=I got in the security line which was very annoying and took a long time to get through .
#id=8
#text=Finally I got to the terminal and was able to board the plane .
#id=9
#text=I got on and stowed my luggage and took my seat .
#text=When the plane took off I tried to fall asleep to pass the time , but I was too excited .
#text=Luckily I had a safe flight and was able to arrive in England with no problems .
